markdownRemark.html:
Hi Friends üëã,

Welcome To aGuideHub!

To change font size of mui typography in React js, you can use this code sx={{fontSize: '1.5rem'}}. It will change font size of mui typography in react js.

Today, I am going to show you, how to change font size of mui typography in react js.

Installation

Install the following packages to use mui typography in react js.

npm

npm install @mui/material @emotion/react @emotion/styled

yarn

yarn add @mui/material @emotion/react @emotion/styled

Table of contents

  • Install MUI and create a new React app.
  • Import Material-UI Typography.
  • Change font size of mui typography Component.

Step 1: Install MUI and create a new React app.

First you have to install the React project. You should use create-react-app command to create a new React project.

npx create-react-app my-app
cd my-app
npm start

Step 2: Import Material-UI Typography.

After installing MUI, you have to import your React component. To do this, add the following line to the top of your component file.

import { Typography } from '@mui/material';

Step 3: Change font size of mui typography Component.

You can use the Typography component in your react js. For example, The typography component is used to create text. and use fontSize property and set 1.5rem.

<Typography sx={{fontSize: '1.5rem'}}>
    Wee willie winkle runs through the town. 
</Typography>

MUI material change font size of mui typography example.

The below code is an example, to change font size in Typography, you need to import Typography Component. You can use inline css style sx={{fontSize: '1.5rem'}} and it will change font size on text.

App.js

import { Typography } from '@mui/material';

export default function MyComponent() {
  return (
    <Typography sx={{fontSize: '1.5rem'}}>
      Wee willie winkle runs through the town.
    </Typography>
  );
}

In the above code example, I have used the @mui/material component and changed font size of mui typography in react js.

Check the output of the above code example.
